name: Lost Fantasy (Champlain Game Academy 2021)
description:
An FPS Adventure game with the main objective being to escape each level while surviving and defeating enemies that are trying to kill your character. The player is a marine of an army that has been deployed on an unfamiliar planet. Everything seems normal and you question why military force was required until you saw your partner brutalized by the unexpected, a unicorn being lifted afloat by a band of fairies. You are caught and forced to disband from your squad and are left to fend for yourself, wandering an aggressive and unfamiliar territory surviving and learning about the odd secrets about this newfound planet populated by deadly fantastical creatures.

Controls:

  • W - Forward
  • A - Left
  • S - Backward
  • D - Right
  • 1 - Swap to Revolver
  • 2 - Swap to RPG
  • 3 - Swap to Shotgun
  • R - Reload
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact (Open Door/Pickup Items)
  • Left Click - Shoot
